mapper.delete: delete from sys_privilege where `master`=#{master} and master_value=#{masterValue}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE when p.id is not NULL then "true" end as checked, r.* FROM sys_resource r LEFT JOIN sys_privilege p ON p.access_value = r.id AND p.`master` = #{master} AND p.master_value = #{masterValue} order by r.sortNo
select count(*) from sys_privilege where access_value=#{accessValue}
